function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in viral signal degradation during storage at 4\\u00b0C","Impact":"Risk of unreliable test results and false negatives if viral signals degrade significantly","Mitigation":"Monitor and analyze degradation patterns, and adjust storage protocols if necessary","Technologies":"Temperature and humidity monitoring systems, automated sample storage and retrieval systems","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Laboratories, research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Unstable sewage flow rate impacted by factors including rainstorms","Impact":"Inaccurate quantification of viral titers due to fluctuating fecal material concentrations","Mitigation":"Use internal reference viruses like PMMoV, develop correction algorithms for flow rate variations","Technologies":"Real-time flow monitoring sensors, data modeling and correction algorithms","People":"Water treatment plant operators, environmental scientists, researchers","Owner":"Water treatment plants, research institutions, environmental monitoring agencies"},{"Description":"Variation in PMMoV levels across samples with a standard deviation of 1.34 C T units","Impact":"Inconsistent and unreliable normalization of SARS-CoV-2 titers across samples","Mitigation":"Improve standardization of PMMoV quantification, account for variability in normalization procedures","Technologies":"Improved qPCR techniques, data normalization algorithms, quality control measures","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Laboratories, research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
